Summary: This is a great park for mountain biking and hiking. Be aware there are snakes in the summer. There are many trails from beginner to advanced. The further back you go, the more you uncover. Amazing this is in the middle of one of the largest metropolitan areas one the planet.  There is no overnight camping at this facility.

We didn't hike or ride bikes, shared wisdom with a gentleman by the name of M Lindsey. He taught us about the animals living in State Park, surrounding mountains and the early settlers, that we felt we were hiking it.
